Class ReadFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.ex6.main.ReadFile
  • public class ReadFile
extends java.lang.Object
    attempt to read the Sjavac file.

      static void readFirst​(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      attempt to read the file by grouping all the lines in a method together, and check the global oop.ex6.variables.
      static void readFunctionsData()
      advanced reading of the Sjavac file, iterates over the function in this file that has been found in the first reading, and check all the lines refer to it.

    • Method Detail

      • readFirst

        public static void readFirst​(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             ActionSyntaxInvalidException,
                             VariableException,
                             InvalidActionTermsException
        attempt to read the file by grouping all the lines in a method together, and check the global oop.ex6.variables.
        Parameters:
        reader - bufferReader for reading the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of problem when reading the file
        ActionSyntaxInvalidException - in case of invalid line.
        VariableException - in case of invalid variable.
        InvalidActionTermsException - in case of invalid content in line

      • readFunctionsData

        public static void readFunctionsData()
                              throws ActionSyntaxInvalidException,
                                     VariableException,
                                     InvalidActionTermsException
        advanced reading of the Sjavac file, iterates over the function in this file that has been found in the first reading, and check all the lines refer to it.
        Throws:
        ActionSyntaxInvalidException - in case of invalid line.
        VariableException - in case of invalid variable.
        InvalidActionTermsException - in case of invalid content in line
